name: Gallery Only Mode
description:
Pinterest is a leach on the internet, stealing images, and leading search engines to dump you there rather than the author's site.  Worse, Pinterest insists that you login to navigate their stolen content.

This removes the login prompt, hides ads, kills the notion that it's some sort of social media site, and forces it to provide a clearly marked (in green, at the top) link to the original source.

You get a fullscreen image of the art, the gallery, and the search bar.  That's it (as it should be)... yes, I'm bitter.  :p
